entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:12 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
